BusinessLayer

Interface IRestaurantProcessing


  • public interface IRestaurantProcessing
    this interface is implemented by the class Restaurant and here are the methods for waiter's and administrator's actions
    Author:
    Diana

      • addItem

        int addItem(java.lang.String den,
            int gr,
            java.lang.String type,
            java.lang.String items,
            double price)
        Parameters:
        den - the name of the product
        gr - the grams of the product
        type - the type of the product
        items - the list of the base products that compose a composite product
        price - the price of the product in case this is a base product
        Returns:
        an integer that represent the code of success / error of the method

      • editItemByName

        int editItemByName(java.lang.String den,
                   java.lang.String den1)
        Parameters:
        den - the name of the product
        den1 - the new name for the product
        Returns:
        an integer that represent the code of success / error of the method
        Custom.pre:
        it insures that the new name is not the same as the initial one
        Custom.post:
        it insures that at the end of the method the name of the product is either the old one, either the new one

      • computePrice

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the order
        nr - the number of the table
        Returns:
        the price
        Custom.pre:
        it insures that the id and the table number are greater than 0
        Custom.post:
        it insures that at the end of the method the price is more than 0
